page.title: 13ENERGY , OIL , TRANSPORT
page.content: Oil importation is operated jointly by Conoco and Lindsey Oil. Each has its own pipeline from the Oil Terminal. Each of the two main pipelines contains 1 million gallons of crude oil and the whole length is monitored continually, and there are elaborate safety and anti pollution controls. Because of high expansion factor special expansion tanks are sited at the end of the line. Expansion of 30,000 gallons is common. The temperature is monitored at all times so that accurate measure can be made of oil discharged. Special tables are used and tonnage is converted to gallons. Example: estimated value of expansion tank oil one day during August 1985 was Â£45,000.
